name: MiniLands
description:
Hi, welcome to MiniLands!

MiniLands was inspired by the Borderlands games and was created in 72 hours for the MiniLD #50 game jam. In true Borderlands fashion it features a lot of guns (3600 of the things) and a variety of things to blow up. There's even a boss fight at the end ;)

There's a webplayer version available on GameJolt, and you can watch my gameplay video of it on my youtube channel.

I hope you enjoy, cheers :)
